fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose two players. Both players are given the option of inputting one of their roles into Noodle's new bot or taking a basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are attacked at night, your attacker is informed they must post a role to Noodle's new bot, otherwise you kill them instead and clean them.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__
